name: Kodiak Deterrent Horn Refill (2016)
description: A replacement cannister for the 2016 model Wildlife Deterrent Horn.Canister provides 12, 2-second blasts of loudness.Horn refill contains approximately 12, 2 second blasts.100% ozone safe and non-flammable propellant.Can be heard up to 0.8km on land and 1.6km on water.
